Title: Noodle Time
Description:
Hello, $n. Care to work the noodle stand again?

Just let me know when you're ready to work another shift and I'll get everything set up.
ObjectivesText: Queue for and complete a shift at the Halfhill noodle stand.
PortraitTurnInText: Great work! Everyone always loves it when they hear that you'll be making noodle soup.

Objectives.Text: Queue for your next shift through Sungshin Ironpaw
Complete a shift at the Halfhill noodle stand
